data.text:
Beautiful hotel with so much for the children. Lots of lovely pools with lifeguards on duty constantly. Different size and depths depending on what you want.

The room was lovely and a great size for our family of 4. Lots of food options including an Al a carte you could book one evening. 

The pool size giros was amazing. The kids club are all DBS/ Police checked although it took a call to Switzerland to find this out. No one on site could tell me.

Very helpful staff. If you saw something broken or out of place it was fixed almost immediately.

Al pools heated, fully included mini bar restocked daily. Includes pool towels and safe.

Great hotel. Long airport transfer though, maybe 1 hour 40.
data.title: Great family hotel

data.text:
Fantastic hotel, hadn’t quite realized the range of activities and space available at the hotel! Kids loved the water slides and the pizza chips and ice creams free throughout the day! Went kayaking and daily volleyball. 

Rooms really spacious and ideal for our family of 5. Had a ground floor apartment near pools and could not fault. 

Resort was coming to a close of winter season so entertainment was reducing throughout the week and restaurants were closing or reducing service but wasn’t an issue to us at all as we liked the variety offered still 

Fab holiday all round
data.title: Brilliant family hotel

data.text: On arriving at this hotel was greeted by a gorgeous reception area ,checked easily and was driven to our room with our bags.Staff were lovely ,food was lovely with plenty of choice,water and wine on the table in restaraunt ,barbecue and street food available also so great if with kids 3 pooks ,one with slides one for little ones and main pool with pool games.Towels were free sunbeds and safe and aircon ,took a bus trip to Lindos only a few euros went to the acropolis ,well worth a visit ,we hired a boat and had it for a full day so seen alot of gorgeous places would reccomend couples and families we are definately going to return loved every minute
data.title: Fantastic hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tracy,

Thank you for choosing the Lindos Princess Beach Resort & Spa for your holiday. We are very glad to hear all of your kind remarks on our food, wine, pools and activities. We hope to host you again in the future and are wishing you the best in the meantime.

Sincerely,
H Hotels Collection
owner_response.author: H HOTELS COLLECTION

data.text:
This is one of the best all inclusive holidays we have been on whether it was because it was coming to the end of season but the food was great always a great choice. 
The Gyros where amazing had them everyday for lunch from street food bar pizza where awesome freshly made on site.
We changed room due to ours not having the right amount of beds but moving was effortless got upgraded to a suite all we had to do was pack up and tell them we where ready and golf kart was sent for us. 

Hotel was very clean and staff where amazing.
data.title: Great hotel not to be faulted

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Damian,

Thank you for choosing the Lindos Princess Beach Resort & Spa for your holiday. We are happy to see that you think our property is one of the best all-inclusive holidays you have ever been on. We are also glad to see that our staff accommodated your needs right away and easily for you. We hope you enjoyed every moment.

Sincerely,
H Hotels Collection
owner_response.author: H HOTELS COLLECTION

data.text:
Excellent service and delicious food and cocktails.
The hotel is very clean  and just 1km from the center of lindos
Very friendly people .
The beach is magic with sunbeds and water sports.
For sure we will visit again.
Congratulations H hotels
data.title: Amazing holidays

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ioannis,

Thank you for taking the time to leave us a perfect review and for sharing some highlighted points from our property. We wish to have the opportunity to host you again soon!

Sincerely,
H Hotels Collection
owner_response.author: H HOTELS COLLECTION
